com.company

Class MyUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.MyUtils

  • public class MyUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    Utilities functions for Euclidean algorithm!

    The MyUtils methods implements an application that simply allows user to read files, calculate distances and train data. TODO: 1) Improve comments 2) Add analytics 3) Add to page
    Since:
    2018-02-15
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Adam Jarzebak
